troubleshooting.title: What To Do if Pancakes Will Not Flip

condition.p: Pancakes are notoriously known for getting stuck to the pan/skillet and refusing to flip over, often causing a mess.

cause.title: Not enough grease
cause.p: When there is not enough oil or grease on the skillet/pan, pancakes will stick and refuse to flip over.

step.cmd: Check the skillet to make sure there is a filmy layer of grease on the skillet.
If it is lacking grease, throw away the defective pancake and put more grease on the skillet/pan before pouring more pancake batter on it.
